title: Monitor Your System Health From Python's Command Line
author: Jessica Wachtel
description: Learn how to use Python's psutil library from the command line for real-time system monitoring, checking CPU and memory usage, tracking processes and automating disk diagnostics without complex monitoring tools.
cntitle: 从 Python 命令行监控你的系统健康
cndescription: 学习如何从命令行使用 Python 的 psutil 库进行实时系统监控，检查 CPU 和内存使用情况，跟踪进程以及自动执行磁盘诊断，而无需复杂的监控工具。
